section.title: About &app;
section.para: &app; was originally written by Laurent Sansonetti. Many people have contributed to it since it was first released. For a full list of contributors, see the file AUTHORS which came with the program. It is currently maintained by Joseph Method. To find more information about &app;, please visit the &app; Web page.
To report a bug or make a suggestion regarding the &app; application or this manual, follow the directions on the &app; Feedback web page.
